text_logic_form: Find the area of the trapezoid.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the area of the trapezoid with vertices $A$, $C$, $B$, and $D$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AD$ is $15$.
The length of the line $DB$ is $10$.
The length of the line $AC$ is $14$.
The lines $AC$ and $AD$ are perpendicular to each other.
The lines $DB$ and $DA$ are perpendicular to each other.
line_instances: There are lines $AC$, $AD$, $CB$, and $DB$, forming the trapezoid $ACBD$.
